Articles.Content:
Sending an antimatter probe to the hill.

Oops. Annihilated.

Sorrie.
I use my ReverseTimeWarpContinued to stop your probe in its tracks. DO NOT DISRUPT THE PEACE ON PLANET HIIIILLLL!
Yay! [@SnacklessKerbal](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/189037-snacklesskerbal/), wanna work on the Geosynchronous orbit station?

Your lovely cooperative hill-ruling goes all Babel-y. I step in just as soon as the defenses fall apart.

My hill.

The defenses never fall apart. Me, [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/), and [@TeslaPenguin1](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185112-teslapenguin1/)'s hill.

OK, the defenses have fallen not apart but together.

[@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/), [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/), and [@TeslaPenguin1](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185112-teslapenguin1/) are lying under the fallen defenses.

P.S.  
[@0111narwhalz](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/110660-0111narwhalz/) is thrown away by recoil.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-08-03T11:13:04Z" title="08/03/2018 11:13  AM" data-short="5 yr">August 3, 2018</time> by kerbiloid**
I am telekinetic. I rebuild the fallen defenses before [@0111narwhalz](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/110660-0111narwhalz/) comes back  in for a reentry. Our hill.
<font face="Lucida Sans Unicode, Lucida Grande, sans-serif">Also I'm telepathic although I don't know it yet. (yes, Seeker plot device)</font>

I bore everyone (except [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/) and [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/)) to death with my 20-min loading time, with 12,000 module manager patches to apply.

True story. (I have like a hundred mods)

**Edited <time datetime="2018-08-03T16:25:12Z" title="08/03/2018 04:25  PM" data-short="5 yr">August 3, 2018</time> by TeslaPenguin1**

I out-bore you with my 32 kilopatch build, though it loads rather a bit faster than 20 minutes.

My hill with snoring penguins.

I drill a huge hole into the planet hill, and trigger [vacuum decay.](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ijFm6DxNVyI) i am unharmed because i teleport to an alternate universe.

Have fun not existing!

Oops. A fluctuation.

Everybody except the hill disappear.

I get [@Matt Lowne](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/159036-matt-lowne/) to build a 1000 seat <abbr title="Single Stage to Orbit">SSTO</abbr>, and distract you by dropping 1000 kerbals on you. My hill.

I use my > > > On 8/2/2018 at 6:05 PM, HansonKerman said: > > > I use my ReverseTimeWarpContinued to reverse time so that none of this ever happened. > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > > DO NOT DISRUPT THE PEACE ON PLANET HIIIILLLL! >
I invite everyone to have their own hills a few km away from mine.

I invite everyone to a peaceful dinner at my hill.

Peace!

Everybody gathers around the ~~future GZ~~  [@TeslaPenguin1](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185112-teslapenguin1/)'s hill to a peaceful dinner.

What a rather opportune moment...
If anyone tries anything... They will instantly be teleported back to their own hills offplanet.
A nice idea. Someone should employ a native dweller of your hill, so he will be teleported into the GZ of the festival.
Our hill.
Humanity's hill.

I am not human, remember? I'm a Glitch god. 

I tear up your hard drives ( or whatever you pitifully stupid humans use for brains anyway ) .

My hills.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-08-05T22:09:03Z" title="08/05/2018 10:09  PM" data-short="5 yr">August 5, 2018</time> by Fraston**

I teleport you into a universe where you cannot use your powers. Me [@HansonKerman](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185809-hansonkerman/) and [@TeslaPenguin1](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/185112-teslapenguin1/)'s hill.
oh wait, i removed your powers a while back. my hills. Spoiler a while bacc

After [@The Minmus Derp](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/187595-the-minmus-derp/) betrayed the humanity capturing hill for himself and his companions, the humanity cancels any of their territorial rights.
